title: Metaverse-ready
text:
• Develop an event space in Decentraland. Holders will be able to display, shop and sell Internet Made NFTs there. Q1 2022
  • Holders of genesis NFT collection with exclusive traits will get an airdropped metaverse NFT that is also a 3d model. Q2 2022
  • All our avatars from the genesis collection are made with 3d software, so you will be able to use them in metaverse TBA

title: Internet Made ecosystem.
text: People staking our NFTs will be receiving our token, redeemable for our exclusive digital and physical items, as well as real world events. <u>Q2 2022</u>

title: Fashion community
text:
• Physical pieces for community members Q1 2022
  • Internet Made popups in fashion capitals Q3 2022
  • Collaborations with fashion houses & talented creatives Q2 2022
  • DAO- Community will be able to participate and decide on our collaborations, funding for talented designers that need capital and platform to release their creations. Q3 2022
